verses.text: \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w*. \w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H2781"\w*!

Our \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w has|strong="H5159"\w* been \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w over|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H2114"\w*.
We \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w orphans|strong="H3490"\w*; \w our|strong="H1961"\w* mothers \w are|strong="H1961"\w* widows.

We must buy \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*; \w our|strong="H8354"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* comes \w at|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w price|strong="H4242"\w*.

We \w are|strong="H7291"\w* closely \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H7291"\w* \w weary|strong="H3021"\w* \w and|strong="H7291"\w* \w find|strong="H5117"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

We \w submitted|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Assyria \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w get|strong="H3027"\w* \w enough|strong="H7646"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H5445"\w* fathers \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w and|strong="H2398"\w* \w are|strong="H5771"\w* no more, but \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5445"\w* \w their|strong="H5445"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Slaves|strong="H5650"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*; there \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no \w one|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w deliver|strong="H6561"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H6561"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w We|strong="H5315"\w* get \w our|strong="H6440"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* risk \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H6440"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w hot|strong="H3648"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w oven|strong="H8574"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* fever \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w*.

\w Women|strong="H1330"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* been \w ravished|strong="H6031"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w Princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w hung|strong="H8518"\w* \w up|strong="H8518"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* receive \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w respect|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* toil \w at|strong="H5375"\w* millstones; \w boys|strong="H5288"\w* \w stagger|strong="H3782"\w* \w under|strong="H3782"\w* loads \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8179"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w have|strong="H2205"\w* \w left|strong="H7673"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; \w the|strong="H8179"\w* young \w men|strong="H2205"\w* \w have|strong="H2205"\w* \w stopped|strong="H7673"\w* their \w music|strong="H5058"\w*.

\w Joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w left|strong="H7673"\w* \w our|strong="H7673"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*; \w our|strong="H7673"\w* \w dancing|strong="H4234"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* mourning.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w from|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*. Woe \w to|strong="H7218"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*!

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w faint|strong="H1739"\w*; \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w*, \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w grow|strong="H2821"\w* \w dim|strong="H2821"\w*â€”

\w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w which|strong="H2022"\w* \w lies|strong="H8074"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, \w patrolled|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5769"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, reign \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w endures|strong="H5769"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w forever|strong="H5331"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w so|strong="H5800"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*?

\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Yourself, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*; \w renew|strong="H2318"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H6924"\w*,
